interactivity.to_get_this_event: Autoplays after " Fruits of the Two Seasons " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " Wither " .

progression.synopsis: Ami and Sensei stop by a restaurant after their trip to the manga store. Ami briefly tries to ask about what happened between him and Molly , being quickly shutdown and told to drop it. After a bit of back and forth, Ami reveals she's written a poem for Sensei for today. He ends up liking it and encourages her to write more if inspiration strikes. Excited by this, Ami decides to try and show Sensei some poems her mother had written but blacks out upon opening the pictures up.

changelog: This Event was added in Update .23p2.
